name: Patchwork Kingdom #730 | Tipvigora
description: The twin kingdoms of Tipvigora, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 132 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 88 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
